content.text:
[@daan](@MRiJ+CvDnD9ZjqunY1oy6tsk0IdbMDC4Q3tTC8riS3s=.ed25519) 

There's a CLI if you're into that sort of thing, but it doesn't support any Beaker-specific API stuff. I think of Dat as "torrents that the author can modify later", so while the Beaker features are *awesome* I don't think they'll have support in other Dat utilities. Maybe a Beaker for Firefox is possible?
